chapter.title: Sample Code
chapter.para:
You can check out sample code from the MyBatis repository on Google Code.
Java code
Config files
Any of the samples can be run with JUnit 4.
The sample code shows a typical design where a transactional service gets domain objects from a data access layer.
This service calls a data access layer built with MyBatis. This layer is composed by a MyBatis mapper interface UserMapper.java and optionally by a implementation UserMapperImpl.java

The database access layer has been implemented using the some of the different techniques explained in this manual. SampleBasicTest will show you the recommended and simplest configuration based on a MapperFactoryBean. SampleAutoTest shows a minimal xml configuration based on component scanning and autowiring. SampleSqlSessionTest will show you how to hand code a DAO using a Spring managed SqlSession. And finally SampleBatchTest will show how to use a batch session. Please have a look at the different applicationContext.xml files to see MyBatis-Spring in action.
